onboarding1.title: Send, Receive & Manage your IOTA tokens
onboarding1.body: Firefly is the official wallet of IOTA.

legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy & Terms of Service

setup.title: Stel jou beursie op
setup.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to keep your tokens separate and improve privacy.
setup.body2: For now, let's start with your first profile name. You can add more profiles later.

secure.title: Secure your wallet
secure.body1: Save and print the Recovery Kit PDF template.
secure.body2: If you fill out the Recovery Kit and store it safely, you will always be able to recover your wallet.

password.title: Skep 'n wagwoord
password.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
password.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.body1: Stel 'n login PIN op om seker te maak dat net jy jou beursie kan toegang.

pin.title: Stel PIN-kode op
pin.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

confirmPin.title: Verifieer jou PIN-kode
confirmPin.body1: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private.
confirmPin.body2: Re-enter your PIN code to proceed.

backup.title: Back-up you beursie
backup.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backup.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backup.body3: As jy jou herstelfrase verloor, kan jy jou geld verloor.

recoveryPhrase.title: Herstel frase
recoveryPhrase.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
recoveryPhrase.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
recoveryPhrase.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyRecoveryPhrase.title: Verifieer herstelfrase
verifyRecoveryPhrase.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order.
verifyRecoveryPhrase.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupWallet.title: Back-up na 'n Stronghold lêer
backupWallet.body1: Enter your password to backup your wallet to a Stronghold file. Your password is used to encrypt the backup.
backupWallet.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupWallet.reason1: Easily recover your wallet without typing in your recovery phrase
backupWallet.reason2: Import your wallet to other devices

recoveryPhraseSaved.title: Backu-up suksesvol
recoveryPhraseSaved.body: Jy het jou beursie ge back-up na 'n Stronghold.

congratulations.title: Wallet setup completed
congratulations.body: Your new wallet is ready to use.

import.title: Voer 'n beursie in
import.body: As jy 'n herstelfrase of 'n Stronghold back-up het, kan jy dit hier invoer.

importFromText.title: Herstel jou beursie met 'n herstelfrase of seed
importFromText.body1: A seed consists of 81 characters. This is used to recover from an older Trinity wallet.
importFromText.body2: A recovery phrase is 24 words long (with spaces). This is used to recover an existing Firefly wallet.
importFromText.body3: Voer you seed of herstelfrase in

importFromFile.title: Restore your wallet using a backup file
importFromFile.body: Voer 'n rugsteunlêer in om jou beursie te herstel. Back-up kan 'n Stronghold (.stronghold) of 'n Trinity SeedVault (.kdbx) wees.

importBackupPassword.title: Herstel jou beursie vanaf 'n SeedVault of 'n Stronghold
importBackupPassword.body1: Sleutel asb jou back-up wagwoord in.
importBackupPassword.body2: Dit is die wagwoord wat jy ingestel het toe jy die back-up gemaak het.

importSuccess.title: Jy het jou back-up suksesvol herwin
importSuccess.body: Jy kan nou jou nuwe beursie instel.
importSuccess.seedvaultBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.
importSuccess.strongholdBody: Your password is correct, you can now continue.

migrate.title: Migreer jou fondse
migrate.body1: Hierdie is 'n outomatiese proses om jou fondse na jou nuwe beursie oor te dra. Ons sal kyk na spandeerde adresse wat jou sekuriteit verswak.
migrate.body2: Dit kan 'n rukkie neem. Moenie jou toestel tydens die migrasie afskakel nie.

generalSettings.title: Algemene instellings
generalSettings.description: Configure your wallet’s appearance and other general settings

security.title: Sekuriteit
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advancedSettings.title: Gevorderde instellings
advancedSettings.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Help & Inligting
helpAndInfo.description: Find the answer to a question or get help with an issue

profile.title: Profiel
profile.description: Change your profile name or set an avatar

currency.title: Geldeenheid
currency.description: Adjusts balance conversion and updates chart options

exportStronghold.title: Export Backup
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallet and latest transaction history.

appLock.title: Automatic Lock
appLock.description: Time elapsed before your wallet locks and logs you out

changePassword.title: Verander wagwoord
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallet. You must use a strong password to protect your funds.

changePincode.title: Verander PIN-kode
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

deleteProfile.title: Vee profiel uit
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire wallet, profile and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup.

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking an iota:// link

developerMode.title: Ontwikkelaar mode
developerMode.description: Connect to testnets and other developer features

nodeSettings.title: Node instellings
nodeSettings.description: Select Manual to choose from the node list or connect to your own node

proofOfWork.title: Proof of work
proofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or oursource to the node

errorLog.title: Foutlêer
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

stateExport.title: State export
stateExport.description: Export your transaction history to a .csv file

troubleshoot.title: Probleemoplossing
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Dokumentasie
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported.

login.pleaseWait: Wag asseblief {time, plural, one {1 sekonde} other {# sekondes}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {1 verkeerde poging} other {# verkeerde pogings}}

strongholdBackup.title: Stronghold Back-up
strongholdBackup.weeksAgo: {weeks, plural, one {# week} other {# weke}} ago

password.title: Wagwoord benodig
password.subtitle: Voer asseblief you beursie-wagwoord in om Stronghold te ontsluit

version.title: Huidige weergawe: {version}
version.upToDateDescription: Jy gebruik die nuutste en veiligste weergawe van Firefly.

backup.title: Laaste backup: {date}
backup.lastBackup: Jy het laas 'n backup op {date} gemaak
backup.backupDescription: Dit is belangrik om gereeld 'n backup te maak om te verseker dat jy 'n afskrif van jou rekeninge en transaksiegeskiedenis het.
backup.backupWarning: As jy jou backup en herstelfrase verloor, verloor jy toegang tot jou fondse.
backup.notBackedUpDescription: Jy het nie jou Stronghold gebackup nie

deleteAccount.title: Remove {name}?
deleteAccount.body: You can add this account back later but you may lose your transaction history.
deleteAccount.typePassword: Type your wallet password to confirm.
deleteAccount.errorBody1: To remove an account it must have 0 balance.
deleteAccount.errorBody2: Jy het tans {balance} op hierdie rekening oor. Skuif hierdie fondse na 'n ander rekening en probeer weer.
deleteAccount.errorBody3: You cannot remove this account, you must have at least one.

node.removeConfirmation: Is jy seker dat ujy hierdie node wil verwyder?

deleteProfile.title: Vee profiel uit
deleteProfile.confirmation: Is jy seker jy wil hierdie profiel uitvee? Hierdie bewerking kan nie ontdoen word nie.

general.uploadSeedvaultOrStronghold: Voer 'n Stronghold of SeedVault lêer in
general.noAccounts: Jy het geen rekeninge nie, skep asseblief een.
general.exportingStrongholdFailed: Uitgevoer van die Stronghold het misluk

dates.daysAgo: {time, plural, one {# dag} other {# dae}} ago
dates.weeksAgo: {time, plural, one {# week} other {# weke}} ago
dates.monthsAgo: {time, plural, one {# maand} other {# maande}} ago
dates.yearsAgo: {time, plural, one {# jaar} other {# jare}} ago

notifications.failed: Uitgaande {{value}} vanaf {{account}} het nie oordra nie
notifications.downloadingUpdate: Besig om bywerking af te laai
notifications.updateError: 'N Fout het tydens die opdatering voorgekom. Probeer asseblief weer
notifications.minutesRemaining: {minutes, plural, one {1 minuut oor} other {# minute oor}}

profile.length: Jou profielnaam mag nie langer as {length, plural, karakter {1 karakter} other {# karakters}}.
profile.duplicate: Daar bestaan ​​reeds 'n profiel met hierdie naam.

password.tooWeak: Jou nuwe wagwoord is te swak.
password.row: Reguit rye sleutels is maklik om te raai.
password.pattern: Kort sleutelbord patrone is maklik om te raai.
password.names: Algemene name en vanne is maklik om te raai.
password.repeats: Herhalings soos 'aaa' is maklik om te raai.
password.repeats2: Herhalings soos 'abcabcabc' is maklik om te raai.
password.sequence: Rye van karakters is maklik om te raai.
password.years: Die afgelope jare is maklik om te raai.
password.dates: Datums is maklik om te raai.
password.similar: Hierdie is soortgelyk aan 'n gewone wagwoord.
password.reasonWord: 'N Enkele woord is maklik om te raai.
password.length: Jou wagwoord mag nie langer as {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakters}} wees nie.

pincode.length: Jou PIN moet wees {length, plural, one {1 syfer} other {# syfers}} lank.

account.length: Jou rekeningnaam mag nie langer as {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakters}} wees nie.
account.empty: Jy moet jou nuutste rekening gebruik voordat jy 'n nuwe een skep.
account.notEmpty: Jy moet jou saldo oordra voordat jy hierdie rekening uitvee.
account.duplicate: 'n Rekening met hierdie naam bestaan alreeds.

send.addressLength: Adresse moet {length, plural, one {1 karakter} other {# karakters}} lank wees.
send.amountTooHigh: Dit is groter as jou beskikbare balans.
send.amountNoFloat: As eenhede 'i' is, kan jy nie desimale plekke gebruik nie.
send.amountInvalidFormat: Die bedrag lyk na 'n ongeldige nommer.
send.amountZero: Die bedrag moet groter as 0 wees.
send.sendingDust: You cannot send less than 1 Mi.
send.leavingDust: You cannot leave less than 1 Mi on your address.

node.https: HTTPS word vereis. Stel 'n ontwikkelaarprofiel op om onveilige HTTP-verbindings te gebruik.
node.unsynced: The node is not in sync.

backup.invalid: Die back-up is nie herken nie.
backup.destination: Die back-up was nie geldig nie.
backup.mnemonic: Die mnemoniese is nie geldig nie.
backup.seedTooShort: Die seed moet 81 karakters lank wees, dit {length, plural, one {is 1} other {is #}}
backup.seedCharacters: Die seed moet slegs karakters A-Z of 9 bevat
backup.phraseWordCount: There should be 24 words in your recovery phrase, currently there {length, plural, one {is 1} other {are #}}.
